name: Panda Craze
description:
Help Tik-Ling make it home to her Bamboo Forest in this action-puzzler! Evil Zoo Keepers keep popping up all over the place trying to capture her. Can you help her escape? Seventy-five levels of classic arcade action challenges both your reflexes and your creativity as you use quick moves and tools to slip away from those dastardly Zoo Keepers! Download Panda Craze Gold today for fabulous family fun!
